package.name: Ip_Based_Payment_Method
package.summary: Module will allow to restrict payment methods based on customers Ip address.So It will be very useful in case you testing checkout process and need method like 'Check/Money Order' for you.
package.description:
This Module will be very useful to enable any of below payment method only for you i.e only for your IP address :
'check money order' 'cashondelivery' 'purchaseorder'
A practical example of usefulness of this module will be :
You want to test checkout process of website and you have payment methods available which require you to make live payment.
So in that case you will need payment method like 'Check Money Order' to avoid live payment and place order.
